Text: If this is sourced from the BD, it is NOT the 1980 version.  Please get your facts straight.
That is correct, and it is NOT the 1980 version.  It has the alterations made in 1997, 2004, and 2011 for the Blu-ray release.  The original 1980 version does NOT exist officially as a BD source.
WHO THE FUCK GIVES A SHIT, IT'S FREE!!!
I know it's free, you fucking dumbass.  I was just pointing out that the title for the torrent is incorrect.
